statements: SELECT * FROM transaction_data WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT transaction_id, sender_address, receiver_address FROM transaction_data WHERE amount < 500;
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address FROM transaction_data WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT transaction_id, amount, timestamp FROM transaction_data WHERE sender_address = 'Alice';
SELECT * FROM transaction_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC, amount ASC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_data WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT transaction_id, sender_address, receiver_address FROM transaction_data WHERE sender_address LIKE '0x%' ORDER BY transaction_id ASC;
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transaction_data GROUP BY sender_address, receiver_address HAVING total_amount > 5000 ORDER BY sender_address ASC;
SELECT sender_address, MAX(amount) AS max_amount FROM transaction_data GROUP BY sender_address ORDER BY max_amount DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM transaction_data WHERE amount >= 50 AND timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY amount ASC;
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM cryptocurrency_transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT transaction_id, sender_address, receiver_address, amount, transaction_date FROM cryptocurrency_transactions WHERE sender_address='Alice' AND receiver_address='Bob';
SELECT pattern_id, pattern_description, anomaly_detected FROM ai_patterns WHERE anomaly_detected = true;
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency_transactions LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency_transactions ORDER BY transaction_id DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM cryptocurrency_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_transactions, AVG(amount) AS average_amount FROM cryptocurrency_transactions WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT pattern_description, anomaly_detected FROM ai_patterns WHERE pattern_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY pattern_id;
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency_transactions WHERE sender_address LIKE '%ABC%' OR receiver_address LIKE '%XYZ%' AND amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM cryptocoin_transactions;
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM cryptocoin_transactions WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT transaction_id, sender_address, receiver_address, transaction_date FROM transaction_history ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, amount, transaction_date FROM transaction_history WHERE sender_address = 'Alice';
SELECT transaction_id, anomaly_type, detected_on FROM anomaly_detection WHERE anomaly_type = 'Suspicious' ORDER BY detected_on ASC;
SELECT * FROM cryptocoin_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM transaction_history WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM cryptocoin_transactions WHERE amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY amount ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, detected_on FROM anomaly_detection ORDER BY detected_on DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, transaction_date FROM transaction_history WHERE sender_address LIKE '%abc%' OR receiver_address LIKE '%xyz%' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Transactions;
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM Transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT block_id, miner_address, hash FROM Blocks WHERE difficulty = 5 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM Addresses WHERE owner_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT transaction_id, block_id, address_id, anomaly_score FROM Analytics WHERE anomaly_score > 0.8 ORDER BY anomaly_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM Transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM Transactions WHERE sender_address='0x123456789' ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT * FROM Blocks WHERE difficulty >= 5 ORDER BY hash DESC
SELECT miner_address, COUNT(*) AS block_count FROM Blocks GROUP BY miner_address HAVING block_count > 10 ORDER BY block_count DESC

SELECT a.analytics_id, t.amount, b.timestamp FROM Analytics AS a JOIN Transactions AS t ON a.transaction_id = t.transaction_id JOIN Blocks AS b ON a.block_id = b.block_id WHERE a.anomaly_score > 0.8 ORDER BY a.analytics_id ASC
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, sender_address, receiver_address FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT wallet_id, user_id, balance FROM wallets ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT node_id, node_address, node_type FROM blockchain_network WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT block_id, previous_block_id, transactions_count, block_hash, timestamp FROM blockchain_blocks ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT block_id, transactions_count, block_hash FROM blockchain_blocks WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY transactions_count DESC;
SELECT wallet_id, balance, currency FROM wallets WHERE currency = 'USD' ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT node_id, node_type, status FROM blockchain_network WHERE status = 'active';
